name_localized.it: Suite con una camera da letto Queen

short_description_localized.en: 1 Bedroom Suite - Spacious 600 Sq Ft / 56 sqm - Marble Foyer - Separate Parlor with Sofa and Armchairs - Marble Bath - includes custom toiletries - plush terry cloth robes - 55 gallon tub.
short_description_localized.fr: Suite 1 chambre - 600 m² / 56 m² - Hall d'entrée en marbre - Salon séparé avec canapé et fauteuils - Bain en marbre - Comprend des articles de toilette personnalisés - Peignoirs en tissu éponge moelleux - Baignoire 55 gallons.
short_description_localized.it: Suite con 1 camera da letto - Ampio 600 mq / 56 mq - Foyer in marmo - Salone separato con divano e poltrone - Bagno in marmo - include articoli da toeletta personalizzati - morbidi accappatoi in spugna - vasca da 55 galloni.

description_localized.en: Stylish, spacious, with a touch of Italian chic, our One bedroom suites make a luxurious choice for a vacation or business trip to New York. Every suite in our Manhattan hotel features a marble foyer, king size bed and a bathroom big enough for a deep, relaxing bath. One Bedroom Suites are located on floor 3 - 7.
description_localized.fr: Élégantes, spacieuses, avec une touche de chic italien, nos suites d'une chambre constituent un choix luxueux pour des vacances ou un voyage d'affaires à New York. Chaque suite de notre hôtel de Manhattan comprend un hall en marbre, un lit king-size et une salle de bain assez grande pour un bain profond et relaxant.
description_localized.it: Eleganti, spaziose, con un tocco di chic italiano, le nostre suite con una camera da letto sono una scelta lussuosa per una vacanza o un viaggio d'affari a New York. Ogni suite del nostro hotel di Manhattan dispone di un foyer in marmo, un letto king size e un bagno abbastanza grande per un bagno profondo e rilassante.

images.name: One-Bedroom-Suite-Queen-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 600 square foot suite, featuring either a Queen size bed with a sitting bench at the foot of the bed. French doors separate the bedroom and living room. The living room includes a seating area with one armchair, a full size sofa, and ottoman. In the center of the lounge area is a glass coffee table with matching end table with lamp. Adjacent to the seating area is a full size bar with marble counter top and  three bar stools. . Wall decor includes Italian inspired artwork. The bathroom is made with Italian marble and features a 55 gallon soaking tub.

images.name: One-Bedroom-Suite-Queen-
images.alt: This photo showcases out 600 square foot suite bedroom with a Queen size bed against the wall and a seating bench at the foot of the bed. Across from the bed there is a six drawer dresser and a wall mounted 42 inch flat screen TV. Adjacent to the dresser is the full size Italian marble bathroom. The bedroom also features a full size closet with mirrored sliding doors. French doors will lead to the living room which features a full size bar, three bar stools and a wall mounted flat screen 42 inch TV.
